<span><a class="cur" href="race/tour-de-france/2025/route">Route<span>&#x25BC;</span></a><ul><li><a href="race/tour-de-france/2025/route/stages">Stages</a></li>

</ul></span>

</ul></span>
</div><div class="clear"></div>
<div class="thumbnav"><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france">Tour de France</a></span><span>&nbsp; &raquo; &nbsp;</span><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france/2025">2025</a></span><span>&nbsp; &raquo; &nbsp;</span><span><a class="blue" href="race/tour-de-france/2025/route/final-5k">Final 5k</a></span></div>
<div class="titleCont hasSideNav"><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag c24 fr "></span> <h1><span class="hideIfMobile">2025 &nbsp; &raquo; &nbsp; 112th </span>Tour de France</h1></div><div class="subtitle hide imob block"><h2>2025</h2></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="title-line2 hideIfMobile"><font class="blue">21 Stages</font> &nbsp; &raquo; &nbsp; <font class="red">Lille Métropole &nbsp;&rsaquo;&nbsp; Paris (Champs-Élysées)</font> &nbsp; <font class="red"style="font-weight: normal; ">(3338.8km)</font></div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>
<div class="desktop-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord general"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div>
<div class="page-content "  >
<h2>Final 5k analysis</h2>
<div class=""><div class="">
<h4>Most vertical meters in final 5k</h4><table class=" basic" style="max-width: 500px; " ><thead><tr>

<th class="w67 ">Stage</th>

</tr></thead><tbody>

<div class="mt50">
<h4>Historical</h4><div class="fs14">How does the total sum of vertical meters in the final 5k compare to previous editions?</div>
